class.name: MultiKMeansPlusPlusClusterer

javadoc.text: A wrapper around a k-means++ clustering algorithm which performs multiple trials * and returns the best solution.
javadoc.param: <T> * type of the points to cluster
clusterer the k-means clusterer to use

javadoc.text: Returns the embedded k-means clusterer used by this instance.
Returns the number of trials this instance will do.

javadoc.return: a list of clusters containing the points
javadoc.throws: MathIllegalArgumentException if the data points are null or the number * of clusters is larger than the number of data points
ConvergenceException if an empty cluster is encountered and the * underlying {@link KMeansPlusPlusClusterer} has its{@link KMeansPlusPlusClusterer.EmptyClusterStrategy} is set to {@code ERROR}.

method.name: cluster
method.comment: at first, we have not found any clusters list yet
compute the variance of the current list
compute the distance variance of the current cluster
this one is the best we have found so far, remember it
return the best clusters list found
